amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a process to identify policies which should be adopted and implemented by the United States to provide domestic job growth in the clean energy sector.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-213 to require the committee to study policies which will lead to creation of American jobs in the clean energy sector.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 232 (Roll no. 735).
